Class LibraryMember

java.lang.Object
User
LibraryMember
public class LibraryMember extends User
The LibraryMember class simulates a user of the library. This class works as a subclass to the user superclass but has specific variables. It has special priveleges compared to a guest user in that it can borrow a list of books.
Version:
0.6 28/11/23
Author:
Robert Mackie
